name: Archive Now Dance!
description:
Online archives don’t have to be dead and boring bits, stored dormant on servers in dark rooms somewhere waiting to be spun up out of non-existence by users unlikely to stumble upon them.

Online archives can be alive and fun. And dancing!

All artefacts taken from the Minneapolis Institute of Art’s public domain online archive hosted on Sketchfab. 

Warning: Dancing online archives might make it more difficult to study the digitized artefacts contained therein due to their innate restlessness.    

Music credit:

01 Take My Heart 1952 by Open Music Archive (CC BY-SA 3.0)
02 Because 1952 By Open Music Archive (CC BY-SA 3.0)
06 Everything I Have Is Your 1953 by Open Music Archive (CC BY-SA 3.0)
